By  Northern Star StaffAugust  

The following was taken directly from area police and fire department records or from the DeKalb County court records PERIOD Anyone mentioned is presumed innocent until proved guilty in a court of law PERIOD

At  a.m PERIOD Saturday DeKalb Police located Ryan S PERIOD Davis  of DeKalb in the  block of Hillcrest Drive PERIOD Davis was wanted on a failure to appear warrant PERIOD Davis was arrested for FTA warrant  driving while license suspended transported to the police department and released on bond PERIOD

At  p.m PERIOD Thursday DeKalb Police responded to a dispute in the  block of Ridge Drive PERIOD While investigating police found Ivory Turney  of DeKalb to be wanted on a FTA warrant PERIOD Turney was arrested for FTA  consumption transported to the police department and released on bond PERIOD

At  p.m PERIOD Wednesday DeKalb Police stopped a vehicle in the  block of North Peace Road for a traffic violation PERIOD After searching the vehicle police found drug paraphernalia PERIOD The driver Xena A PERIOD Lovings  of DeKalb was arrested and charged with unlawful possession of drug paraphernalia PERIOD She was later released on bond PERIOD

At  p.m PERIOD Wednesday DeKalb Police stopped a vehicle in the  block of West Lincoln Highway after the officer observed the driver not wearing a seat belt PERIOD Police learned the driver Mitchell J PERIOD Trevino  of DeKalb had a suspended license PERIOD Trevino was arrested and charged with driving with a suspended license and not wearing a seat belt PERIOD He was later released on bond PERIOD

At  p.m PERIOD Wednesday DeKalb Police were called to the  block of Settler Drive for a suspicious vehicle PERIOD Police learned the driver Luis A PERIOD Mejia  of DeKalb did not have a valid drivers license PERIOD Mejia was arrested and charged with driving without a valid license PERIOD He was later released on an individual bond PERIOD
